Comment: 3. ....... Bc5.  The first three moves are those of the Guico Piano.  An opening beginners are encouraged to try first.  This opening is old and is also played at Expert level at least on Gameknot.  It is not seen quite as often at GM level because the Spanish Opening and the Sicilian have dominated things.
